message: Hello Bob! I'm excited to offer you this amazing product. I think you'll love it!
I'm interested in the product, but $180 is a bit steep for me. I'm willing to pay $120 for it.
I understand your concerns about the price, Bob. I'm willing to meet you halfway. How about we compromise at $160?
I appreciate the compromise, but I'm still a bit above my budget. I'm willing to pay $140 for the product.
I understand you're trying to stick to your budget, Bob. I'm willing to make another adjustment. How about we meet at $152?
I'm getting close to my limit, but I'm still a bit hesitant. I'm willing to pay $135 for the product.
I understand you're getting close to your limit, Bob. I'm willing to make another adjustment. How about we meet at $145?
I'm really close to my limit, but I'm still willing to negotiate. I'm willing to pay $130 for the product.
I understand you're really close to your limit, Bob. I'm willing to make one more adjustment. How about we meet at $138?
I'm really close to my limit, and I'm not sure I can go any lower. I'm willing to pay $125 for the product.
